snippet: Illinois officials who also lobby say they disclose those ties. But the disclosure rules leave lots of room for errors and omissions.

byline.original: By FREDRIC N. TULSKY and JOHN SULLIVAN
byline.contributor:
Kristen McQueary contributed reporting.
Ms. McQueary covers state government
for the Chicago News Cooperative
and the public radio station WBEZ.

lead_paragraph: Illinois officials who also lobby say they disclose those ties. But the disclosure rules leave lots of room for errors and omissions.

headline.seo: Illinois Lobbying Disclosure Rules Often Leave Holes
